articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Ryongmun Liquor Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Ryongmun Liquor Factory
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the Ryongmun Liquor Factory.
					 Commanding a bird's-eye view of the production buildings and compound nestled in a valley surrounded by high mountains with a broad smile on his face, Kim Jong Un said the longer he watched them, the more clean and neat they looked. He added he might rest assured of the quality of foodstuff when he looked at them only from outside as the face is the index of the heart.
					
					 Recalling the Ryongmun Liquor Factory was built on the personal initiative of leader Kim Jong Il who instructed the KPA to build and operate a modern liquor factory conducive to the development of the nation's food industry, he proposed erecting in the compound of the factory a mosaic depicting Kim Jong Il looking at foodstuff and personally chose its site.
					
					 Kim Jong Un went round various places of the factory including the process for filtering water, liquor production and packing processes and a depot to learn in detail about production and modernization.
					
					 He said: "I am pleased to see the factory filtering spring water well before using it for liquor production to thoroughly ensure the quality of liquor as it remains unchanged in all seasons in terms of quantity and physical and chemical properties".
					
					 Watching piles of products at the liquor depot, he said such a fantastic scene would have been unthinkable without keeping the production going at a high rate. 
					
					 At the room for the display of products, he saw an analysis diagram estimating the quality of Ryongmun liquor in comparison with other liquor before acquainting himself with the alcoholic strength, volume and quality of various liquor products of the factory.
					
					 Looking at the brand of Ryongmun liquor, he was pleased that the factory excellently designed it to meet the flavor and taste of the Korean people as he had stressed the importance of successfully designing it during his visit to the factory last year.
					
					 He instructed the factory not to rest content with the successes already made but to develop the Ryongmun liquor as a famous one representing the DPRK by realizing the automation of production processes at a higher level and further improving the quality of products.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, KPA Col. General So Hong Chan, first vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, and Han Kwang Sang, department director of the Central Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: Greetings to Ethiopian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Ethiopian President
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Mulatu Teshome, president of Ethiopia, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, wishing the friendly Ethiopian people bigger progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Nepalese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Nepalese President
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Ram Baran Yadav, president of Nepal, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, wishing the president and people of Nepal successes in their work for the independent development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Nepalese PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Nepalese PM
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Sushil Koirala, prime minister of Nepal, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message wished the prime minister and government of Nepal bigger successes in their work for achieving the political stability and unity of the country and its economic development.
					
					 It expressed belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the future, too.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Work for Preserving Revolutionary Relics
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Work for Preserving Revolutionary Relics
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the work for preserving revolutionary relics at the Samjiyon Revolutionary Battle Site.
					 Going round the Samjiyon Grand Monument, he acquainted himself in detail with the work for taking a good care of the statue depicting President Kim Il Sung who made a historic advance into Musan area during the anti-Japanese armed struggle, several groups of subsidiary theme sculptures and the shore of Lake Samji.
					
					 A consultative meeting was held on the spot. It discussed measures for implementing the on-site instructions given by Marshal Kim Jong Un in November last year and the issue of remodeling the lodging quarters of visitors at the Samjiyon Revolutionary Battle Site, the Samjiyon Soft Drink Factory and the Samjiyon Souvenir Factory.
					
					 Meanwhile, he went round various industrial factories in Samjiyon County associated with the leadership exploits of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu, the Samjiyon Schoolchildren's Palace, Cultural Hall of Samjiyon County, sports village in Mt. Paektu area and other places. He called for pushing forward the projects to make hurrah for socialism and the Workers' Party ring out first from Samjiyon County where Mt. Paektu, a holy mountain of revolution, stands.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams Spokesman for S. Korean Defense Ministry for His Anti-DPRK Provocative Remarks
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams Spokesman for S. Korean Defense Ministry for His Anti-DPRK Provocative Remarks 
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet military group is being deeply engaged in "dealings for security", putting the situation on the Korean peninsula at extreme peril.
					 Spokesman for the Ministry of Defense Kim Min Sok at a press conference on April 14 made thoughtless remarks that the "north threatens peace and stability not only on the Korean peninsula but in the rest of the world". On April 29 he also cried out for a "resolute counteraction" to "provocations" by the DPRK.
					
					 On May 12 he went the lengths of letting loose invectives labeling the DPRK a "historically retrogressive country" and a "country that should disappear at an early date".
					
					 On May 22 the puppet military hooligans staged a farce of floating a fiction about "shelling" by the Korean People's Army at the most sensitive area in the West Sea of Korea in a bid to brand it as "a provocateur".
					
					 The puppet joint chiefs of staff at the "fourth great forum for bolstering up joint capability" opened to public the "five-phase military strategy towards north for unification" to which the concept of "fourth generation war" was applied.
					
					 This is a total denial of the DPRK, an open disclosure of their ambition for "achieving unification through absorption" and a declaration of a war disclosing their scenario for all-out military confrontation with the DPRK and confrontation of social systems.
					
					 All the successive south Korean regimes slandered the inviolable political system in the DPRK and the south Korean Ministry of Defense worked out military strategies and operations targeting the DPRK at all times. But it is the first time that the "five-phase military strategy" envisaging specific proposals for overthrowing the socialist system in the DPRK such as "operation for destabilizing it ", "operation for disabling nukes and missiles" and " operation for stability " was set forth accompanied by coarse vitriol and military provocations against the DPRK.
					
					 The active dealings being made by the puppet Defense Ministry allegedly to ensure security are the last-ditch effort of the Park Geun Hye group to get rid of its catastrophic crisis.
					
					 The present south Korean puppet authorities have been driven into a bottomless quagmire due to the suspicion of fraudulent "presidential" election, the racket for eliminating the "forces following the north", worsening people's livelihood and an economic slump, etc. To top it all, the unprecedented ferry sinking disaster triggered off the public resentment at Chongwadae, pushing the Park group into an impasse.
					
					 Being hit hard from all sides, the Park group let the puppet Defense Ministry float a series of fictions such as stories about a "nuclear test in April" and the "north's drones" in an effort to seek a way out.
					
					 The ministry is set to fight a war with the DPRK by straining the situation on the Korean peninsula while counting on the military hardware of its American master. But this is as foolish an act as jumping into fire with faggot on one's back.
					
					 No wonder, even the south Korean media jeered at the Defense Ministry, saying it seems that the ministry made the same mistake as a shepherd's and it is engaged in dealings for security by straining the situation for no reason to provoke the north.
					
					 The puppet Defense Ministry's "dealings for security" are neither for the sake of compatriots nor for peace and stability on the peninsula. The Park regime is censured for toeing the outsiders' policy and acts of treachery. What it is doing is no more than a charade to save it from sinking to the bottom of the sea as what happened to ferry Sewol.
					
					 The DPRK has the unbreakable single-minded unity of the army and people and nuclear armed force which it has built up with much effort.
					
					 The puppet Ministry, a group of colonial mercenaries and a rash mob without its own soul, feature and the prerogative of supreme command, seeks to bring down the socialist system in the DPRK. This is a daydream reminding one of a puppy unafraid of a tiger and an intolerable and hideous crime against the nation.
					
					 The puppet Defense Ministry should clearly know that it is the first target of retaliatory blows to be entailed by its thoughtless outbursts and war moves.
					
					 Only merciless punishment awaits the Park Geun Hye military group for a series of its thrice-cursed crimes.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Regime Can Never Evade Responsibility for Ferry Disaster: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Regime Can Never Evade Responsibility for Ferry Disaster: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- The ferry Sewol disaster was not an accidental one but a hideous massacre committed by the Park Geun Hye regime of south Korea.
					 The Park group made public a "talk to the people" and is now going busy taking follow-up measures in a bid to evade the blame for the crime.
					
					 In the "talk" Park begged the south Koreans for pardon, requesting for one more chance.
					
					 She shifted the blame for the disaster on to the maritime police, the Ministry of Security and Administration and the Ministry of Maritime Fisheries. She talked about a number of "steps" including the disbandment of the maritime police, establishment of state security agency and the enactment of a special law including the fact-finding committee.
					
					 She has been busy, ostensively dismissing Prime Minister Jong Hong Won, Director of the Intelligence Service Nam Jae Jun and Chief of the security office of Chongwadae Kim Jang Su who aroused anger of the bereaved families and other people and calling for a "Cabinet reshuffle".
					
					 However, this is not a fundamental solution as it is just a stopgap measure to tide over the ruling crisis and a delaying tactics to prop up power.
					
					 In fact, the puppet group has neither probed the truth into the disaster nor taken any measure to rescue the remainder of those missing although more than a month has passed since the accident.
					
					 In five weeks since April 16 when the accident occurred, it hurled a total of more than 1 700 intelligence policemen into Tanwon High School in Ansan, the joint incense burning center and the scene of accident on Jin Island, touching off anger among the bereaved families and other people.
					
					 In the evening when Park made public the "talk to the people", police belonging to the Tanwon Police Station were spotted while shadowing bereaved families.
					
					 At a time when the whole of south Korea turned into a mourner's house, Park invited U.S. President Obama to tour it, far from concentrating efforts on bringing the confusion under control. Only a few hours after making public the talk, she set out for overseas trip.
					
					 The racket for taking "measures" for coping with the Sewol tragedy kicked up by the Park group every day is just aimed to deceive the public and bar her approval rate from sinking.
					
					 That's why the public is unanimous in commenting that it is not a normal way of thinking to take measures for investigating and threatening bereaved families and other people behind the scene while making an apology to them.
					
					 The Sewol disaster is a product of all evils endemic in the Park regime plagued with all kinds of diseases and blamed for its retrogressive, unpopular and unethical nature.
					
					 With no sleight of hand can the Park group evade the responsibility for the Sewol tragedy.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Removing Traitor Park Geun Hye, Root Cause of National Disaster
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Removing Traitor Park Geun Hye, Root Cause of National Disaster
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of south Korea is the cancer-like entity which should be removed at an early date as it is escalating distrust and confrontation between the north and the south, not trust, and increasing the danger of a nuclear war with each passing day, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Park group is the anti-reunification group of heinous traitors who pushed the inter-Korean relations to a catastrophe with its vicious confrontational policy and heinous warmongers who are driving the situation on the Korean peninsula to the touch-and-go situation with incessant provocations and war hysteria against the north.
					
					 It is a real intention of the Park group to attain its ambition for invading the north even if it reduces the whole country to ashes and plunges the Koreans into the sea of blood.
					
					 A stray dog may make the water of a river muddy. The inter-Korean relations and the situation on the Korean peninsula have been put into the worst phase owing to the traitor Park, obsessed with confrontation and war.
					
					 As long as the Park group keen on the confrontation with the DPRK, indifferent to the destiny of the country and the nation, stays in power, the Koreans can never live in peace even for a moment.
					
					 The prevailing situation shows that in order to improve the inter-Korean relations, achieve the peace and reunification and carve out the bright future of the nation, all Koreans should turn out as one to resolutely remove traitor Park, the root cause of national disaster.
					
					 The Park group harmful to the inter-Korean relations and the Koreans will be sternly judged by history and the nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns S. Korean Military Hooligans for Their Confrontational Racket
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns S. Korean Military Hooligans for Their Confrontational Racket
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Yun Pyong Se, south Korean puppet minister of Foreign Affairs, in the recent talks with the high representative of the European Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy pulled up the DPRK over its "threat." He went the length of blustering that "provocative" act in the West Sea is "unpardonable."
					 Puppet war-like forces, the arch criminal of the recent provocation case, are claiming that the north fired shells first and it was aimed to "disturb the routine guard operation of the south and nullify the northern limit line". They even blared that "if the north provokes the south, the latter would relentlessly punish the former."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary terms this a brigandish act like the guilty party filing the suit first.
					
					 The story about "shelling of the north" floated by the Park Geun Hye group after firing shells first clearly proves what a serious phase the group's anti-DPRK smear campaign and confrontation hysteria have reached, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 What matters is that the puppet forces are busying themselves with new military provocations, vociferating about "unpardonable act" and "relentless punishment", not content with floating the fiction full of lies and hypocrisy.
					
					 It is a prerequisite for providing a sure guarantee for the peace of the country and security of the nation to thoroughly contain the puppet forces' evermore reckless confrontation racket.
					
					 They had better clearly understand that they would be mercilessly punished if they go reckless.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Park Geun Hye Group for Hurting Fellow Countrymen in League with U.S., Japan Masters
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Park Geun Hye Group for Hurting Fellow Countrymen in League with U.S., Japan Masters
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- James Clapper, administrator of the State Intelligence Agency of the United States, was closeted with the puppet forces at Chongwadae, Intelligence Service, the Ministry of Defense and other places during his recent unpublicized junket to south Korea. Clapper discussed with puppet forces the issue of concluding a memorandum of understanding for an agreement on sharing military information among the U.S., Japan and south Korea and the issue of involving south Korea and Japan in the missile shield.
					 Minju Joson Wednesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The Korean nation cannot escape disaster of a new war, a nuclear war as long as the Park Geun Hye group rushing headlong into the confrontation with compatriots in the north in collusion with its U.S. and Japanese masters is allowed to stay in power.
					
					 We cannot but take a serious note of the fact that the Park's group is zealously joining the U.S. in its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The coteries of the puppet Ministry of Defense did not conceal the fact that they are making a "practical discussion" of the issue of concluding the MOU for an agreement on sharing the military information among the U.S., Japan and south Korea while talking about the "north's preparation for the fourth nuclear test" and "military movements" with Clapper's visit to south Korea as a momentum.
					
					 The Park group's moves are an unpardonable treason to escalate tensions on the Korean peninsula and do harm to the fellow countrymen in the north with the help of foreign forces.
					
					 To remove the Park's group as soon as possible is the way of preventing the national disaster.

articles.title: Staff Members of Russian Embassy Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Staff Members of Russian Embassy Help Korean Farmers
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Timonin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy did a friendship work at the DPRK-Russia Friendship Kochang Cooperative Farm in Chollima District, Nampho City on Wednesday.
					 The guests helped agricultural workers in weeding in a field of corn.
					
					 At a break they had a talk with farmers and enjoyed an art performance.
					
					 Staff members of the embassy handed aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Mongolian Party Leader Praises Invincible Might of WPK
articles.content:
Mongolian Party Leader Praises Invincible Might of WPK
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Munkhbat Jamiyan, secretary general of the Mongolian People's Party, who visited the DPRK praised the invincible might of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) which is fully demonstrating its might as an ever-victorious steel-like party.
					 He went on: This time we visited the DPRK to boost bloody bonds and friendly and cooperative relations between the Mongolian People's Party and the WPK. These relations between the two parties provided by the leaders of Mongolia and President Kim Il Sung have a long tradition.
					
					 Many achievements have been made in various fields in the 60 odd year-long history of friendship. The agreement on cooperation between the Mongolian People's Party and the WPK signed during the visit recorded a new page in the history of the development of the friendly relations between the two parties.
					
					 While staying in the DPRK, I was astonished to see Pyongyang where world-level splendid structures have been built under the leadership of the WPK.
					
					 It is the biggest miracle that the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum which comprehensively deals with the history of great victory and other monumental edifices were built in a matter of less than one year.
					
					 I was deeply impressed to visit the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace where I learned well that the WPK considered the work for the rising generation as the most important affair of the party and the state and spared nothing for the education of the younger generation.
					
					 The DPRK has a tremendous potential to build a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The WPK has successfully discharged its sacred mission and role as the staff of the revolution by leading the struggle of the working people. In this course it achieved the independent sovereignty of the country and its prosperity and development and wrought miracles of history despite difficulties and grim ordeals. The WPK is, indeed, a party of victory and guidance.
					
					 This is the precious fruition of the outstanding leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Un who has always guided the WPK along the road of victory and glory.
					
					 I am firmly convinced that the Korean people will achieve greater successes in carrying out the sacred cause for the prosperity of the country under his leadership. It is my belief that the friendly relations between the two parties will last forever.

articles.title: Agitation for Faster Rice Transplantation Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Agitation for Faster Rice Transplantation Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Artistes of the DPRK are inspiring agricultural workers and helpers with field agitation.
					 Artistes of the Phibada Opera Troupe are making an agitation performance tour of cooperative farms in North Hwanghae Province including the Migok Cooperative Farm, Sariwon City.
					
					 Artistes of the National Folk Art Troupe are also giving performances in potato production areas in Ryanggang Province.
					
					 The agitation activities of the artistes of the National Theatrical Troupe are being conducted in rural areas in Pyongyang and Nampho cities, stirring up the fields alive with transplanting rice seedlings.
					
					 Acrobats of the National Circus give peculiar pieces including physical acrobatics, jugglery and comic acrobatics in farms in Taedong, Phyongwon and Sukchon counties in South Phyongan Province, instilling revolutionary optimism and enthusiasm into the people.
					
					 The colorful agitation performances given by provincial art troupes and artistes including art troupes of South Phyongan, North Hamgyong, South Hwanghae and Kangwon provinces are greatly encouraging the agricultural workers and helpers to work innovations in their immediate spring season farming work everyday.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation of Ministry of Railways Leaves for Lithuania
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation of Ministry of Railways Leaves for Lithuania
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation of the Ministry of Railways headed by Minister Jon Kil Su left here on Wednesday to take part in the 42nd ministerial meeting of the Organization of Railways Cooperation to be held in Lithuania.

articles.title: Institutions of DPRK Intensify Support to Sports
articles.content:
Institutions of DPRK Intensify Support to Sports
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Ministries and national institutions of the DPRK have taken active part in the campaign for assisting the sports organizations in the country.
					 The Ministry of Foreign Affairs provided the Basketball Association with varieties of athletic equipment and training apparatuses helpful to developing the basketball technique. It also pays deep attention to ensuring international exchanges on this sports event.
					
					 The Taesong Bank offered lots of apparatuses needed to put the handball training on a scientific basis, while the Ministry of Public Health and the Ministry of State Construction Control have supplied many materials for the construction of new gyms and stadiums.
					
					 Besides, the Pyongyang Horticulture Guidance Bureau, the Kyonghung Guidance Bureau and other institutions distinguished themselves in helping the sports teams.

articles.title: Potato Drinks Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Potato Drinks Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Various kinds of drinks made from potato are now widely used for the promotion of people's health in the DPRK.
					 Those natural functional drinks were developed by the Food Research Institute under the Branch Academy of Light Industrial Science.
					
					 They include yogurt, calpis and juice and contain solanine, polyphenol and other functional ingredients, which are efficacious for preventing aging, raising immunity, reducing blood pressure and treating inflammation.
					
					 The Institute found out a proper mixing ratio of raw materials for potato drinks and established their production process and method. 
					
					 Dr. Kim Thae Gyu told KCNA that the Institute would develop the drinks into nano-level to be competitive in world market.

articles.title: Folklore Park Drawing More Visitors with Traditional Men's Costumes
articles.content:
Folklore Park Drawing More Visitors with Traditional Men's Costumes
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Different kinds of Korean traditional men's costumes have been put on display at the traditional costume exhibition of the Korean Folklore Museum in the Pyongyang Folklore Park, drawing more visitors.
					 Among the exhibits are commoners' jackets and trousers, generals' uniforms, armors and others, which date back to the periods of Koguryo Kingdom (B.C. 277-A.D. 668), Koryo Kingdom (918-1392) and Feudal Joson Dynasty (1392-1910).
					
					 The visitors are deeply impressed to see the wax replica of Ri Sun Sin (1545-1598), a famous patriotic general, in a military uniform.
					
					 Ri Mi Hwa, chief of the Traditional Costume Workshop in the museum, told KCNA that those men's costumes on display give a glimpse of the history of development of national costumes.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Urges Park Geun Hye Step down
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Urges Park Geun Hye Step down
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- A memorial service took place in front of the south Korean consulate general in Los Angeles, the United States on May 24 as part of actions of Koreans in the U.S. demanding Park Geun Hye bear the responsibility for the ferry Sewol disaster in south Korea and step down.
					 Present there were many Koreans in the U.S. including couples carrying their children in perambulators.
					
					 The participants paid a silent tribute to the deceased before watching a video dealing with the disaster.
					
					 The person who presided over the service said that the families of the victims to the disaster wanted a limitless investigation into Park Geun Hye and demanded the authorities find out all dead bodies.
					
					 However, Park in a "talk to the people" talked about the disbandment of the Maritime Police Agency as a measure, he charged.
					
					 If Park truly shed her tears, she should have mentioned the victims and carried the demand of their families in her "talk", he said, underscoring the need to prove who makes sincere words and who drops crocodile tears.
					
					 Korean women spoke next:
					
					 Park has neither elementary etiquette nor obligation. As such a woman holds the post of "president", the people are paying a dear price. As the people wrongly elected the daughter of the "yusin" dictator as "president", they should not repeat the past wrongdoing. Park Geun Hye is to blame for the ferry Sewol disaster. We will never forget this disaster.
					
					 They declared that they would continue demonstrations until the demands of the families of the victims are met and those responsible for the disaster punished.

articles.title: S. Korean Professors Blame Park Geun Hye for Causing Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Professors Blame Park Geun Hye for Causing Ferry Sewol Disaster
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Resentment at the Park Geun Hye group which caused the ferry Sewol tragedy is running high among professors in south Korea.
					 More than 100 professors of Chungang University in Seoul, the Jeju Professor Network for Truth and Justice which is a meeting of university professors in Jeju area, over 130 professors of Yonsei University, professors of Taegu University, the Council of Professors of Jonnam University, the Council of Professors of Chongju University, professors of Kangwon University and south Korean university professors and scholars residing overseas made public declarations on the situation, joint statements and statements and held press conferences where they urged the Park Guen Hye regime to hold the heaviest responsibility for the disaster.
					
					 The Sewol tragedy was caused by the "government" which has been keen on maintaining and protecting the ruling quarters only and bureaucrats who colluded with big businesses, subservient to the neo-liberal system, they said.
					
					  The "government" which fails to protect the people and respect historical assessment can not be called the "government" for the people, they noted, warning such "government" will meet people's resistance and stern punishment.
					
					 Asserting that the Park Geun Hye regime's incompetency and irresponsibility caused the tragedy, they urged the authorities to hold full responsibility.
					
					 The professors are voicing their will to fight it out until the Park group and the puppet regime indifferent to the security of the people and the conservative media that shunned the truth are judged.

articles.title: Maltreatment of Children Gets Serious in S. Korea
articles.content:
Maltreatment of Children Gets Serious in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Maltreatment of children is getting serious in south Korea, according to Yonhap News on May 25.
					 The mortality of children due to maltreatment last year was all time high since 2001, it reported.

articles.title: Fire Occurs in S. Korea
articles.content:
Fire Occurs in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Fire broke out at a building of Koyang, Kyonggi Province on May 26, according to south Korean MBC. The fire left five persons dead.
					 The fire occurred in the wake of electric car clash in a subway, collapse of a building and other accidents after the ferry Sewol disaster in south Korea.
					
					 The south Korean people live in uneasiness and fear as they do not know where and what accident will take place again.

articles.title: Anti-"Government" Struggle Waged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-"Government" Struggle Waged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) waged an anti-"government" struggle in Seoul on May 24 demanding the probe into the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 Participated there were members of the leadership of the KCTU, chairmen of the trade unions under it and union members.
					
					 Angered by the authorities' act of evading the responsibility for the disaster, they marched towards Chongwadae, chanting "Park Geun Hye, step down".
					
					 When the police stopped the demonstrators, they launched a sit-in strike on the road before Posin Pavilion.
					
					 The fascist police took away scores of sit-in strikers but they waged a staunch struggle, denouncing the puppet chief executive for causing the disaster due to her incompetence and irresponsibility and evading the thorough-going probe into the truth.
					
					 Prior to it, KCTU and its affiliated organizations held rallies in different parts of south Korea.
					
					 At the rally held at Chonggye Plaza Sin Sung Chol, chairman of the KCTU, said it would opt for an all-out action against the regime which caused the Sewol disaster and is keen on realizing the anti-workers policy including suppression of labor, easing of regulations and denationalization.
					
					 Spokesman Pak Song Sik said that KCTU would head for Chongwadae to demand the "president" own all responsibilities.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Tajik Politician
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Tajik Politician
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, made public a statement on May 21 to mark the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of his work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 The statement said:
					
					 Epochal changes were made in the DPRK since Kim Jong Il started the work at the Central Committee of the WPK. 
					
					 The DPRK shed its rays as socialism centered on the popular masses where the people become the master of everything and everything serves them.
					
					 Under his Songun leadership the Korean People's Army developed into a matchless army and the DPRK into an invincible power with reliable war deterrence. 
					
					 He led the service personnel to take the lead in economic construction and made sure that all the people learned from the fighting spirit displayed by the service personnel and performed feats and innovations in all fields and units. The rosy prospect for building a thriving nation opened in the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Cambodian Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Cambodian Media
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- A Cambodian newspaper and broadcasting services edited special articles and programs between May 20 and 23 to mark the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 The Cambodian newspaper Pracheachon carried the following article titled "Eternal General Secretary of WPK" illustrated with photos of his revolutionary activities:
					
					 Kim Jong Il unexpectedly passed away but the WPK and the Korean people are holding him in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the WPK.
					
					 He developed in depth the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung as required by the times and the developing revolution, performing great exploits for the party's ideas and theories.
					
					 His ideas and theories are the immutable truth and banner of eternal victory of the WPK and the Korean people dynamically advancing toward the final victory for building a thriving nation. 
					
					 It is one of his distinguished exploits that he made the party and the people form a harmonious whole with one idea and purpose.
					
					 He is immortal along with the ever-victorious WPK which is leading the general advance of the Korean people for building a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					 The State Radio Broadcasting, Apsara TV and Radio Broadcasting and F.M. 90.5 Radio also praised him for devoting himself to improving of the people's living standard and building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Websites of Ecuador
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Websites of Ecuador 
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was posted by the Kim Jong Il Library and the Juche Youth Group in Ecuador on their websites on May 23. 
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), says that holding leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is a principled requirement to victoriously advance the cause of the Korean revolution. It also clarifies the tasks for steadily developing the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Licor Ryongmun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Licor Ryongmun
 Pyongyang, 28 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Licor Ryongmun.
					 Contemplando con amplia sonrisa los edificios de produccion y el recinto de la fabrica situada en el valle rodeado de las montanas altas, el Mariscal dijo que no tenia algo de preocuparse de la calidad de los productos al ver solo el aspecto exterior de la fabrica bien ordenada y limpia.
					
					 Puesto que la fabrica fue construida por la iniciativa del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien ordeno al EPC construir y administrar la moderna fabrica de licores y contribuir al desarrollo de la industria alimentaria del pais, hay que levantar cortesmente, en el recinto de la fabrica, el mural de mosaicos con imagen del Dirigente averiguando los alimentos, senalo el Mariscal y fijo personalmente el lugar del mural.
					
					 Recorriendo varios puntos de la fabrica inclusive los procesos de filtracion de agua, la produccion y el embalaje de licores y el almacen, averiguo en detalles del estado de la produccion y modernizacion.
					
					 Le gusta presenciar lo que se producen los licores mediante la filtracion de agua manantial invariable tanto en la cantidad de brote como en  el caracter fisicoquimico, lo que garantiza con firmeza la calidad de los productos, destaco.
					
					 Cuando recorria con la mirada satisfecha los productos apilados en el almacen como una montana, apunto que no podia ver este aspecto tan abundante sin normalizarse la produccion en alto nivel.
					
					 En la sala de exhibicion de productos leyo la tabla de analisis de comparacion de calidad entre el licor Ryongmun y los otros y averiguo del alcohol, el volumen y la calidad de varios licores producidos en esta fabrica.
					
					 Al mirar la marca de licor Ryongmun, dijo que habia subrayado la importancia del diseno de marca durante su visita del ano pasado, y expreso su alegria de que fue disenada la excelente marca conveniente a los sentimientos esteticos de nuestro pueblo.
					
					 El Mariscal apunto que sin vanagloriarse de exitos logrados la fabrica debe realizar en el alto nivel la automatizacion de los procesos de la produccion y elevar mas la calidad de los productos para que el licor Ryongmun se haga lo famoso que represente nuestro pais.
					
					 Le acompanaron el vicemariscal Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres del EPC, So Hong Chan, primer viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, y el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita dia nacional de Etiopia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita dia nacional de Etiopia
 Pyongyang, 28 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 28 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica Federal Democratica de Etiopia, Mulatu Teshome, con motivo del dia nacional de ese pais africano.
					 En la misiva, el remitente desea al amistoso pueblo etiope mayor progreso y prosperidad y expresa conviccion de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita dia nacional de Nepal
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita dia nacional de Nepal
 Pyongyang, 28 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 28 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de Nepal, Ram Baran Yadav, con motivo del dia nacional de este pais.
					 En su misiva, el remitente expresa confianza de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran aun mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises de larga tradicion historica.
					
					 Desea a su destinatario y a su pueblo exitos en sus labores para el desarrollo independiente y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Premier coreano averigua el estado de conservacion de lugar de interes historico-revolucionario
articles.content:
Premier coreano averigua el estado de conservacion de lugar de interes historico-revolucionario
 Pyongyang, 28 de mayo (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju hizo conocimiento en el terreno de las labores de conservacion de los objetos de interes historico-revolucionario del lugar de batalla revolucionaria de Samjiyon.
					 Recorriendo el Conjunto Monumental de Samjiyon, averiguo en detalles las labores para conservar mejor la estatua de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung emprendiendo la historica marcha hacia la zona de Musan en el periodo de la lucha armada antijaponesa, y el estado de mantenimiento de los conjuntos escultoricos subtematicos y el lago Samji.
					
					 En la reunion consultiva convocada en el terreno, fueron tomadas las medidas para materializar las instrucciones del Mariscal Kim Jong Un dadas en noviembre del ano pasado sobre el terreno y se discutio el problema de remodelar el campamento para los visitantes al campo de batalla revolucionaria de Samjiyon, la fabrica de refresco de Samjiyon, la fabrica de recuerdos de Samjiyon para facilitar el confort de los visitantes al lugar.
					
					 Ademas, el premier dio vueltas por las fabricas de industria local del distrito de Samjiyon, el Palacio de Escolares y Ninos de Samjiyon, la Casa Cultural del Distrito de Samjiyon, la villa deportiva de la zona del monte Paektu y otros lugares en que estan impregnadas las huellas de direccion de los Grandes Hombres sin pares del monte Paektu.
					
					 Subrayo la necesidad de acelerar la remodelacion para que repercutan alto los vitores del socialismo y del Partido del Trabajo desde el distrito de Samjiyon donde esta levantado el Paektu, monte sagrado de la revolucion coreana.
